data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Botafogo.
In the minute 3, It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Botafogo's half.
Goianiense GO to take a throw-in in Botafogo territory.
In the minute 6, Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Can Botafogo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goianiense GO's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Botafogo in Goiania.
In the minute 8, Ball safe as Botafogo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a throw-in for Goianiense GO, close to Botafogo's area.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
In the minute 11, Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Goianiense GO are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 13, Goal kick for Goianiense GO at Serra Dourada.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Goianiense GO capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Botafogo's half?
In the minute 16, Throw-in Botafogo.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 18, Free kick Goianiense GO.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden waits before resuming play because Janderson Santos de Souza for Goianiense GO is still down.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
In the minute 20, Botafogo needs to be cautious. Goianiense GO have an attacking throw-in.
Goianiense GO's Janderson Santos de Souza is back in action after a slight knock.
Goianiense GO advance rapidly upfield but Leandro Pedro Vuaden blows for offside.
In the minute 21, Goianiense GO awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Botafogo have a goal kick.
In the minute 23, Corner awarded to Botafogo.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 24, Goianiense GO have a dangerous throw-in.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Botafogo a goal kick.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 25, Caio Alexandre (Botafogo) gets a yellow card.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in the half of Botafogo.
Matheuzinho of Goianiense GO gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 26, Ball goes out of play for a Botafogo goal kick.
Free kick for Botafogo in the half of Goianiense GO.
In the minute 28, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Goianiense GO.
Kanu (Botafogo) has received a yellow card from Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Throw-in for Botafogo in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Goianiense GO goal kick.
In the minute 33, Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Botafogo are pushing forward but Matheus Babi's finish is wide of the goal.
Goianiense GO have a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Botafogo are in shooting range from this free kick.
Free kick Botafogo.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Botafogo a goal kick.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Botafogo.
In the minute 40, Botafogo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Botafogo have been awarded a penalty...
It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The first-half has come to a close in Goiania.
In the minute 45, Victor Luis smashes in a penalty at Serra Dourada. The score is now 0-1.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Botafogo make their first substitution with Luiz Otavio replacing Caio Alexandre.
In the minute 47, Throw-in Goianiense GO.
Can Botafogo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goianiense GO's half?
Throw-in for Botafogo close to the penalty box.
In the minute 47, Throw-in high up the field for Botafogo in Goiania.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO at Serra Dourada.
Goal kick for Botafogo at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 50, Goal! Goianiense GO go level at 1-1 through Hyuri in Goiania.
Janderson Santos de Souza instrumental with a fine assist.
Botafogo's Luiz Otavio gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 52, Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Goianiense GO a goal kick.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Goianiense GO attack but Hyuri's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 53, Botafogo have a goal kick.
Goianiense GO to take a throw-in in Botafogo territory.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Botafogo.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO close to the penalty box.
In the minute 60, It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
Botafogo drives forward and Kevin gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 64, In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the home team.
At Serra Dourada, Carlos Renteria has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Chico is replacing Matheus Vargas for the home team.
Gustavo Ferrareis is replacing Matheuzinho for Goianiense GO at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 66, Goianiense GO's Janderson Santos de Souza gets in a shot on goal at Serra Dourada. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Botafogo in their own half.
Botafogo's Luiz Otavio is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 69, Play has been interrupted briefly in Goiania to check on Jean, who is grimacing with pain.
The away team have replaced Pedro Raul with Salomon Kalou. This is the second substitution made today by Paulo Autuori.
In the minute 70, Goianiense GO’s Jean is on his feet again at Serra Dourada.
Throw-in for Botafogo at Serra Dourada.
Paulo Autuori is making the team's third substitution at Serra Dourada with Davi Araujo replacing Bruno Nazario.
Corner awarded to Botafogo.
In the minute 73, Goal kick for Botafogo at Serra Dourada.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Gilvan is booked for the home team.
In the minute 76, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Goianiense GO push upfield but Leandro Pedro Vuaden quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 77, Ball goes out of play for a Botafogo goal kick.
Vagner Mancini (Goianiense GO) is making a third substitution, with Junior Brandao replacing Hyuri.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
In the minute 78, Botafogo have a dangerous throw-in.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Botafogo just outside Goianiense GO's area.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 80, The home team replace Joao Victor with Nicolas Vichiatto.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
Dudu is on a sub for Natanael for Goianiense GO.
In the minute 82, Botafogo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Botafogo at Serra Dourada.
Ball goes out of play for a Goianiense GO goal kick.
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to Botafogo.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Botafogo.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Goianiense GO a goal kick.
In the minute 87, Botafogo have a goal kick.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
In the minute 89, Goianiense GO's Dudu has been booked in Goiania.
Free kick for Botafogo in the half of Goianiense GO.
Junior Brandao (Goianiense GO) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Botafogo at Serra Dourada.
Free kick Botafogo.
7 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Goiania.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a throw-in for Botafogo, close to Goianiense GO's area.
Edson has recovered and rejoins the match in Goiania.
Can Goianiense GO capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Botafogo's half?
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
Ball safe as Botafogo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Edson for Goianiense GO who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
